attributes.action: require the Police to make re-opening a road after an accident their top priority to keep traffic flowing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After an accident and following the rescue of casualties, a main road or motorway can be closed for hours on end whilst the Police muck about taking photos, etc. The top priority of the Police should be to re-open the road and get the traffic moving. All roads should be fully reopened within 20 minutes of the last casualty leaving the area.
